name: Snake Fang

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Snake Sidewind, Snake Style, Acrobatics 6 ranks, Sense Motive 9 ranks.

sections.body: While using the Snake Style feat, when an opponent's attack misses you, you can make an unarmed strike against that opponent as an attack of opportunity. If this attack of opportunity hits, you can spend an immediate action to make another unarmed strike against the same opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can unleash attacks against an opponent that has dropped its guard.
